<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <netcdf xmlns="http://www.unidata.ucar.edu/namespaces/netcdf/ncml-2.2" location="http://ferret.pmel.noaa.gov/thredds/dodsC/ct_flux">   <attribute name="Notes" value="This file contains CarbonTracker surface CO2 fluxes." />   <attribute name="disclaimer" value="CarbonTracker is an open product of the NOAA Earth System Research 
Laboratory using data from the Global Monitoring Division greenhouse 
gas observational network and collaborating institutions.  Model results 
including figures and tabular material found on the CarbonTracker 
website may be used for non-commercial purposes without restriction,
but we request that the following acknowledgement text be included 
in documents or publications made using CarbonTracker results: 

     CarbonTracker results provided by NOAA/ESRL,
     Boulder, Colorado, USA, http://carbontracker.noaa.gov

Since we expect to continuously update the CarbonTracker product, it
is important to identify which version you are using.  To provide
accurate citation, please include the version of the CarbonTracker
release in any use of these results.

The CarbonTracker team welcomes special requests for data products not
offered by default on this website, and encourages proposals for
collaborative activities.  Contact us at carbontracker.team@noaa.gov.
" />   <attribute name="email" value="carbontracker.team@noaa.gov" />   <attribute name="url" value="http://carbontracker.noaa.gov" />   <attribute name="institution" value="NOAA Earth System Research Laboratory" />   <attribute name="Conventions" value="CF-1.1" />   <attribute name="history" value="Created on Mon Nov 02 2009 22:37:07 GMT
by script 'Time-stamp: <mistral.cmdl.noaa.gov:/ct/tools/R/make_flux1x1_nc.r - 31 Oct 2008 (Fri) 09:30:03 MDT>'" />   <attribute name="Source" value="CarbonTracker release CT2009" />   <attribute name="_CoordSysBuilder" value="ucar.nc2.dataset.conv.CF1Convention" />   <dimension name="calendar_components" length="6" />   <dimension name="lon" length="360" />   <dimension name="lat" length="180" />   <dimension name="date" length="5112" />   <group name="CFMetadata">     <attribute name="geospatial_lon_min" value="-179.5" type="float" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lat_min" value="-89.5" type="float" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lon_max" value="179.5" type="float" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lat_max" value="89.5" type="float" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lon_units" value="degrees_east" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lat_units" value="degrees_north" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lon_resolution" value="1.0" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lat_resolution" value="1.0" />   </group>   <group name="NCISOMetadata">     <attribute name="metadata_creation" value="2015-03-19" />     <attribute name="nciso_version" value="2.2.2" />   </group>   <group name="THREDDSMetadata">     <attribute name="id" value="ct_flux" />     <attribute name="full_name" value="Carbontracker CT2009 Fluxes" />     <group name="documentation">       <group name="document">         <attribute name="inline" value="This file contains CarbonTracker surface CO2 fluxes." type="Notes" />       </group>       <group name="document">         <attribute name="inline" value="CarbonTracker is an open product of the NOAA Earth System Research Laboratory using data from the Global Monitoring Division greenhouse gas observational network and collaborating institutions. The CarbonTracker team welcomes special requests for data products not offered by default on this website, and encourages proposals for collaborative activities." type="" />       </group>       <group name="document">         <attribute name="inline" value="CarbonTracker CT2009" type="Version" />       </group>     </group>     <group name="services">       <attribute name="opendap_service" value="http://ferret.pmel.noaa.gov/thredds/dodsC/ct_flux" />       <attribute name="httpserver_service" value="http://ferret.pmel.noaa.gov/thredds/fileServer/ct_flux" />       <attribute name="wms_service" value="http://ferret.pmel.noaa.gov/thredds/wms/ct_flux?service=WMS&version=1.3.0&request=GetCapabilities" />       <attribute name="nccs_service" value="http://ferret.pmel.noaa.gov/thredds/ncss/grid/ct_flux/dataset.html" />     </group>     <group name="creators">       <group name="creator">         <attribute name="name" value="NOAA/ESRL" />         <attribute name="email" value="carbontracker.team@noaa.gov" />         <attribute name="url" value="" />       </group>     </group>     <group name="properties">       <attribute name="viewer" value="http://ferret.pmel.noaa.gov/geoideLAS/getUI.do?data_url=http://ferret.pmel.noaa.gov/geoide/dodsC/ct_flux, Visualize with Live Access Server" />     </group>   </group>   <variable name="decimal_date" shape="date" type="double">     <attribute name="units" value="years" />     <attribute name="missing_value" type="double" value="-1.0E34" />   </variable>   <variable name="date_components" shape="date calendar_components" type="int">     <attribute name="units" value="NA" />     <attribute name="missing_value" type="int" value="-9" />     <attribute name="long_name" value="integer components of UTC date" />     <attribute name="comment" value="Calendar date components as integers.  Times and dates are UTC." />     <attribute name="order" value="year, month, day, hour, minute, second" />   </variable>   <variable name="fossil_imposed" shape="date lat lon" type="float">     <attribute name="units" value="mol m-2 s-1" />     <attribute name="missing_value" type="float" value="-1.0E34" />     <attribute name="long_name" value="imposed surface CO2 flux due to fossil fuel burning" />     <attribute name="comment" value="surface_carbon_dioxide_mole_flux" />   </variable>   <variable name="bio_flux_optimized" shape="date lat lon" type="float">     <attribute name="units" value="mol m-2 s-1" />     <attribute name="missing_value" type="float" value="-1.0E34" />     <attribute name="long_name" value="optimized surface CO2 flux due to terrestrial biosphere exchange" />     <attribute name="comment" value="surface_carbon_dioxide_mole_flux" />   </variable>   <variable name="ocean_flux_optimized" shape="date lat lon" type="float">     <attribute name="units" value="mol m-2 s-1" />     <attribute name="missing_value" type="float" value="-1.0E34" />     <attribute name="long_name" value="optimized surface CO2 flux due to air-sea exchange" />     <attribute name="comment" value="surface_carbon_dioxide_mole_flux" />   </variable>   <variable name="fire_flux_imposed" shape="date lat lon" type="float">     <attribute name="units" value="mol m-2 s-1" />     <attribute name="missing_value" type="float" value="-1.0E34" />     <attribute name="long_name" value="imposed surface CO2 flux due to fire emissions" />     <attribute name="comment" value="surface_carbon_dioxide_mole_flux" />   </variable>   <variable name="calendar_components" shape="calendar_components" type="int">     <attribute name="units" value="NA" />   </variable>   <variable name="lon" shape="lon" type="double">     <attribute name="units" value="degrees_east" />     <attribute name="actual_range" type="float" value="-180.0 180.0" />     <attribute name="_CoordinateAxisType" value="Lon" />   </variable>   <variable name="lat" shape="lat" type="double">     <attribute name="units" value="degrees_north" />     <attribute name="actual_range" type="float" value="-90.0 90.0" />     <attribute name="_CoordinateAxisType" value="Lat" />   </variable>   <variable name="date" shape="date" type="double">     <attribute name="units" value="days since 2000-01-01 00:00:00 UTC" />     <attribute name="_CoordinateAxisType" value="Time" />   </variable> </netcdf>
